ConstantSourceNode.summary: The ConstantSourceNode interface—part of the Web Audio API—represents an audio source (based upon ) whose output is single unchanging value. This makes it useful for cases in which you need a constant value coming in from an audio source. In addition, it can be used like a constructible by automating the value of its or by connecting another node to it; see Controlling multiple parameters with ConstantSourceNode.

remarks.para: A ConstantSourceNode has no inputs and exactly one monaural (one-channel) output. The output's value is always the same as the value of the parameter.
